content.description:
Just a general description for the boulder. Not exactly v-hard bouldering by any means but its right in town so highly convenient if you in town. I use the rock for a quick and easy bouldering workout when I cant make it to Nordegg.

From highway 11 take the 59 ave turnoff. Take first right turn and park in behind the church next to the rock.
Crash mat

A small glacial erratic. Be respectful of others, clean up your tick marks and trash and use caution when climbing/spotting as it is near a busy cycling and walking path. A number of climbs/eliminates up to about V5/6. NO FA's here probably as this thing has been climbed on for years. Most likely it was a way marker for First Nations.Â 

****A new Alberta Bouldering Guide (2020/2021?) should provide a topo with more names and route descriptions.
